Text: enrollment transaction trainingERCOT will be conducting follow up training on enrollment transactions along with information on drop to POLR MoveIn Moveout and concurrent processing The training session will be held at the ERCOT Met Center on Thursday January th in Room A from AM to PM Because of space constraints participation is limited to so please email your RSVP to ASAP If necessary a follow up training session will be scheduled at a later date We look forward to seeing you next week Thanks Jack Adams Senior Registration Analyst
